step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in this position.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you lift.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding steady is great. Ensure your head stays upright and you're not pulling forward.
Returning to the start smoothly is good. Keep up the controlled movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter when clasping your hands and maintain an upright head throughout. This helps maximize the stretch for better lymph movement.
